channel.title: Need help with Linus Vps (Centos)
channel.description:
I have been looking around for current tuts on how to setup my RSPS on a linux vps and have found nothing recent. The steps to do this are very confusing being a newcomer, and I would like somebodys help. No I will not give you the VPS info, I just need a step by step kinda.
If someone can help me/give me a recent tut this would help me so much. I know I probably sound stupid to most of you because you've been doing this for awhile but I just need some help.
Thank you.
